tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  theme VARCHAR(50),
  language VARCHAR(50),
  notifications_enabled BOOLEAN
)
CREATE TABLE User_Preferences (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, theme VARCHAR(255), language VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE Settings (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, notification_enabled BOOLEAN, dark_mode_enabled BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE Blockchain_Apps (app_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, app_name VARCHAR(255), app_description TEXT)

CREATE TABLE TransactionHistory (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    description TEXT
);
